title: Apply-db_mutex_lock_nanos up to 5min for 10min during upgrade from 5.3 to 6.2
body:
## Bug Report

<!-- Thanks for your bug report! Don't worry if you can't fill out all the sections. -->

### What version of TiKV are you using?
<!-- You can run `tikv-server --version` -->
./tikv-server -V
 TiKV
Release Version:   5.3.2
Edition:           Community
Git Commit Hash:   b6dd370e0ef26775681052099da48254f71f5647
2022-07-26T00:36:09.962+0800    INFO    k8s/client.go:131       it should be noted that a long-running command will not be interrupted even the use case has ended. For more informat
ion, please refer to https://github.com/pingcap/test-infra/discussions/129
Git Commit Branch: heads/refs/tags/v5.3.2
UTC Build Time:    2022-06-28 05:40:07
Rust Version:      rustc 1.56.0-nightly (2faabf579 2021-07-27)
Enable Features:   jemalloc mem-profiling portable sse protobuf-codec test-engines-rocksdb cloud-aws cloud-gcp
Profile:           dist_release

### What operating system and CPU are you using?
<!-- If you're using Linux, you can run `cat /proc/cpuinfo` -->

### Steps to reproduce
<!-- If possible, provide a recipe for reproducing the error. A complete runnable program is good. -->
Do upgrade.

### What did you expect?
This value should less than 1min.
But seems there is no obvious influence to QPS/Latencyï¼Œso maybe something is wrong with the statistical information.
### What did happened?
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/9443637/181461107-b20cf683-144b-4cb4-a573-7671d25215ce.png)
